civic_corvee_system.zhcn_desc: 这个社会坚信国家有绝对的权力支配人民的劳动和居所。
civic_corvee_system.en_desc: This society considers it the absolute right of the state to decide where its citizens live and work.
civic_corvee_system.zhcn_modifier: 迁入导致的人口增长：§G+15%§!\n强制迁移花费：§G-25%§!

civic_imperial_cult.zhcn_desc: 这个社会普遍信仰一种宗教，他们的统治者被尊为行走于世间的真神。
civic_imperial_cult.en_desc: This society has a dominant state religion where the ruler is worshiped as a living deity.
civic_imperial_cult.zhcn_modifier: 法令持续时间：§G+25%§!\n主流思潮吸引力：§G+10%§!

civic_beacon_of_liberty.zhcn_desc: 它是在黑暗社会中绽放光明的灯塔。自由和民主在这里受到最高的尊崇。
civic_beacon_of_liberty.en_desc: This society is a shining beacon of light in a sea of darkness. Liberty and individual freedoms are held in the highest regard here.
civic_beacon_of_liberty.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_exalted_priesthood.zhcn_desc: 为了防止异端的侵入，我们选择让社会中一群最智慧、最虔诚的神职人员组成的宗教委员会来治理我们的国家。
civic_exalted_priesthood.en_desc: To guard against heresy, this society is ruled by a religious council consisting of the wisest and most pious members of the clergy.
civic_exalted_priesthood.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_philosopher_king.zhcn_desc: 仅仅依靠普通的统治是不够的，政府必须由一个拥有足够智慧和知识的王者来领导它们。
civic_philosopher_king.en_desc: It is not enough to simply rule. The Ship of State must be guided by a king that wields enough wisdom and knowledge to steer it true.
civic_philosopher_king.potential_logic:
№思潮

civic_meritocracy.zhcn_desc: 一个人的个人社会地位或他的人际关系跟他所处的职业没有任何关联。天资和能力才是使社会进步的唯一基础。
civic_meritocracy.en_desc: An individual's social station or personal connections should have no bearing on their profession. The sole basis for advancement in this society is demonstrated ability and talent.
civic_meritocracy.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+1§!\n专家产出：§G+10%§!
civic_meritocracy.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!
№权力制度
№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_citizen_service.zhcn_desc: 你是否履行了自己的责任？只有那些在军队服役完成了政治责任的人才能拥有完整公民权的。服役保障公民权。
civic_citizen_service.en_desc: Are you doing your part? Full citizenship and the political responsibility that comes with it is limited to those who have served a tour of duty in the military. Service guarantees citizenship.
civic_citizen_service.zhcn_modifier: £job_soldier£ §Y士兵§!同时会产出§Y2§!£unity£ 凝聚力\n§Y海军容量§!提升§G15%§!

▲拥有§Y极端亲外主义§!
▲有§Y民主制§!或者§Y寡头制§!政体

civic_technocracy.zhcn_desc: 为了最大限度地提高效率，该社会将科学和理性作为行事准则。那些无知的、危险的、不合格的政治精英们的个人妄想绝对不能介入。
civic_technocracy.en_desc: To maximize efficiency, this society is governed according to the principles of science and rationality. The personal whims of an ignorant and dangerously unqualified political elite must not be allowed to interfere.
civic_technocracy.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!
№权力制度
№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_feudal_realm.zhcn_desc: 这是一个封建的社会制度，君主依靠强大的拥有封地和自主权的封臣们来维持统治。
civic_feudal_realm.en_desc: This society is organized in a feudal manner, with a monarch whose rule relies on powerful vassals that govern their territories with considerable autonomy.
civic_feudal_realm.zhcn_modifier: §Y附属国实力§!对外交关系所产生的效果减少§Y50%§!，但是附属国可以殖民任何无主星系

civic_police_state.zhcn_desc: 不留痕迹的消除任何异议， 在这个压抑的社会中，人们的一言一行都被庞大的内部警力仔细的控制监视着。
civic_police_state.en_desc: To quash any traces of dissent, the population in this repressive society is carefully monitored and controlled by a large internal police force.
civic_police_state.zhcn_modifier: §Y稳定度§!提升§G+5§!\n£job_enforcer£ §Y执法者§!同时会产出§Y1§!£unity£ 凝聚力

№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_idealistic_foundation.zhcn_desc: 建立在强大的理想主义价值观之上的社会。无论当前政府是否对此抱予信任，人们心中永远抱有对美好未来的向往。
civic_idealistic_foundation.en_desc: This society was founded on strong idealistic values. Whether the current government remains true to them or not, the people have not forgotten.
civic_idealistic_foundation.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_environmentalist.zhcn_desc: 这个社会寻求如何与自然和谐相处之道。 非常谨慎地保护环境，尽可能的限制消费。
civic_environmentalist.en_desc: This society seeks to co-exist in harmony with nature. Great care is taken to preserve the environment and limit consumerism where possible.
civic_environmentalist.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_slaver_guilds.zhcn_desc: 社会中真正的权力核心在于一些强大而无情的奴贩公会。 他们懂得如何从一个奴隶身上榨取更多。
civic_slaver_guilds.en_desc: Much of the true political power in this society rests with a number of powerful and ruthless slaver guilds. They know how to get the most out of a slave.
civic_slaver_guilds.zhcn_modifier: 奴隶产出：§G+10%§!\n奴役人口比例：§G+40%§!

№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_inwards_perfection.zhcn_desc: 这个安静平和的社会不愿意接受不懂得他们生活方式的外来者。比起外界的一切，他们更乐于留在自己的世外桃源不受打扰。
civic_inwards_perfection.en_desc: This calm and pacifist society has little use for strangers who do not understand their way of life. More than anything, they would prefer to be left alone.

civic_warrior_culture.zhcn_desc: 这个社会已经发展处一种强悍的武士精神。武功战力高于一切，只有在战场上才能获得真正的荣耀。
civic_warrior_culture.en_desc: This society has developed into a hardy warrior culture. Martial prowess is valued above all else, and true glory can only be found on the field of battle.
civic_warrior_culture.zhcn_modifier: 陆军伤害：§G+20%§!\n将£job_entertainer£§Y演艺人员§!岗位替换为£job_duelist£§Y决斗者§!岗位。\n£job_duelist£ 决斗者将£alloys£ §Y合金§!转化为£unity£ §Y凝聚力§!，£mod_planet_amenities_add£ §Y舒适度§!和£mod_country_naval_cap_add£ §Y海军容量§!

№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_distinguished_admiralty.zhcn_desc: 舰队和海军实力在政界有着极为突出的影响力。他们会有选择性的招募精锐的新兵到他们中来。
civic_distinguished_admiralty.en_desc: The Fleet and the Admiralty have unusually prominent roles in this society, wielding a great deal of influence in political circles. They have the pick of the litter when it comes to new military recruits.
civic_distinguished_admiralty.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器射速：§G+10%§!\n舰队司令等级上限：§G+1§!\n舰队指挥上限：§G+10§!

№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_free_haven.zhcn_desc: 该帝国是远近驰名的自由避风港。疲倦者、穷人、奴隶全都可以在这里呼吸自由的空气——这里来者不拒，不计种群和来历。
civic_free_haven.en_desc: This society has a well-earned reputation as a free haven. The tired, the poor, the huddled masses yearning to breathe free - all are welcome here, regardless of their species or origin.
civic_free_haven.zhcn_modifier: 迁入导致的人口增长：§G+15%§!\n迁入吸引力：§G+50%§!

civic_cutthroat_politics.zhcn_desc: 这种政治制度因其阴谋权术而闻名于世。权力斗争、阴暗的背后交易和密谋策划是理所当然的。然而，那些游戏经验丰富的玩家能更好的掌控它。
civic_cutthroat_politics.en_desc: The political system in this society is renowned for its intrigue. Power struggles, shady backroom deals and cloak and dagger scheming are par for the course. Those who survive long enough to learn the game, however, tend to learn it well.
civic_cutthroat_politics.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!
№权力制度
№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_corporate_dominion.zhcn_desc: 这个社会由一家寰宇企业支配，后者已经完全代替了国家的上层建筑。
civic_corporate_dominion.en_desc: This society is dominated by a megacorporation that has completely supplanted the role of the state.

civic_agrarian_idyll.zhcn_desc: 一个简单而平凡的生活环境往往好处多多。该农业社会在很大程度上设法避免大规模城市化。
civic_agrarian_idyll.en_desc: A simple and peaceful life can often be the most rewarding. This agrarian society has, to a large extent, managed to avoid large-scale urbanization.
civic_agrarian_idyll.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_shadow_council.zhcn_desc: 连自己的国民都不知道，这个社会其实是由一个幕后操控一切的影子内阁统治的。民主的外表必须维持，但是多数专制也得到保留。毕竟，万一有傻子投票给错误的候选人呢？
civic_shadow_council.en_desc: Unbeknownst to its own citizens, this society is actually manipulated from behind the scenes by a secretive shadow council. Appearances must be kept, but the tyranny of the majority should also be guarded against. After all, what if the fools vote for the wrong candidate?
civic_shadow_council.potential_logic:
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!
№权力制度
№基础值≠ §H企业政府§!

civic_mining_guilds.zhcn_desc: 一些大型矿业公会已经占据了社会中的主导地位。政府严重依赖他们的支持。
civic_mining_guilds.en_desc: Several large mining guilds have reached a dominant position in this society. The government relies heavily on their support.

civic_parliamentary_system.zhcn_desc: 该社会的议会制度鼓励言论自由和激烈的讨论。事实证明，巴结一个占据主导地位的政府派系是非常有用的。
civic_parliamentary_system.en_desc: The parliamentary system in this society encourages a free and lively debate. Currying favor with one of the dominant political factions can prove to be quite advantageous.

№思潮

civic_efficient_bureaucracy.zhcn_desc: 该社会以高效著称。我们不仅列车准点，运行一个星际国家所需要的庞大的官僚机器也如流水线般精确运作。
civic_efficient_bureaucracy.en_desc: This society is renowned for its efficiency. Not only do the mag-trains run on time, but the colossal bureaucratic apparatus required to run an interstellar nation has been greatly streamlined.

civic_nationalistic_zeal.zhcn_desc: 强烈的国民自豪感渗透进该社会的各个层面。
civic_nationalistic_zeal.en_desc: A strong sense of nationalistic pride permeates all layers of this society.

civic_functional_architecture.zhcn_desc: 该社会以简单而实用的建筑结构而闻名。有些人把这种建筑风格评价为无趣甚至让人抑郁，但在大多数情况下，新型水泥并不比其它建筑材料差。
civic_functional_architecture.en_desc: This society is renowned for its simple yet functional architecture. There are those who would refer to this building style as boring or even depressing, but in most cases, neo-concrete does the job just as well as any other building material.

civic_aristocratic_elite.en_desc: This society has an entrenched nobility that occupies the upper echelons of society.

civic_mechanists.zhcn_desc: 社会专注于机械人制造的风潮始于蒸汽时代。尽管许多人说这是不可能的，但是事实上，真正意义上的机器人早在太空飞行之前就离开装配线了。
civic_mechanists.en_desc: This society has been preoccupied with the idea of metallic automatons since the early Steam Age. Although many said it could not be done, the first true robots left the assembly lines long before even rudimentary space flight was achieved.
civic_mechanists.zhcn_modifier: 游戏初始人口包含§Y8§! £pop£ 机器人人口，同时也拥有科技和基础设施来建造更多机器人\n机器人维护费：§G-5%§!\n

civic_shared_burden.zhcn_desc: 此社会信奉资源均匀分配的理念，无论是统治阶层还是被统治阶层都理应获得一视同仁的对待。所有人会为社会的整体而努力奋斗。
civic_shared_burden.en_desc: This society believes in an equitable distribution of resources, making little to no distinction between the needs of ruler and ruled. All work together for the benefit of the whole.
civic_shared_burden.zhcn_modifier:
可采用§Y同甘共苦§!生活标准，在该标准下所有£pop£ 人口拥有中等的£consumer_goods£ §Y消费品§!维护费用，无视其所属§Y阶层§!
禁用其他大部分的§Y生活标准§!
§Y稳定度§!提升§G+5§!
人口降低阶层的速度更快。
civic_shared_burden.potential_logic:
№权力制度
△以下条件全部为否
№基础值 =
△§H企业政府§!
△§H蜂巢思维§!
△§H机械智能§!

▲拥有§Y极端平等主义§!
△不是§Y排外主义§!
▲拥有§Y技术治国§!

civic_syncretic_evolution.zhcn_desc: 第二物种是这个社会不可分割的一部分。他们又大又强壮，但大多数的智力跟弱智的孩童差不多。在古代战争中我们将他们好斗的一面剔除了，这让他们变成了最听话的仆人。
civic_syncretic_evolution.en_desc: A second species forms an integral part of this society. They are big, strong and most of them have the intelligence of a particularly dim-witted child. Ancient wars have culled their species of their most aggressive tendencies, leaving them quite servile.

civic_fanatic_purifiers.zhcn_desc: 该帝国热衷于走遍银河各个角落消灭其他的智慧生物。他们会不惜一切代价去消灭所有的外星人。
civic_fanatic_purifiers.en_desc: This society appears hellbent on scouring the galaxy of all other sapient life. Come what may, they will suffer no xenos to live.
civic_fanatic_purifiers.zhcn_modifier:

civic_post_apocalyptic.zhcn_desc: 该文明已经经历过核战争的洗礼并幸存了下来，他们已经在他们的废墟世界上重建了他们的文明。
civic_post_apocalyptic.en_desc: Baptized by nuclear fire, this society has faced total annihilation - and survived. Devastated yet unbroken, they have rebuilt civilization from the ashes of the old world.

civic_life_seeded.zhcn_desc: 该社会被有意的播种在了一个人工天堂之上，他们对于环境的适应能力极其糟糕，但他们有着及其富饶的母星。
civic_life_seeded.en_desc: This society has evolved in a paradise, possibly designed just for them.

civic_barbaric_despoilers.zhcn_desc: 这个社会毫无秩序可言。战斗就是活下去的意义，最强者就可以掌握最强的权力。
civic_barbaric_despoilers.en_desc: This society holds few things sacred. To fight is to live, and the strongest may seize whatever they covet.

civic_byzantine_bureaucracy.zhcn_desc: 此社会是由非常复杂的，对于外人而言简直就是迷宫一般的行政体制所统治。为了维持政府的流畅运作，大量的公职人员会日以继夜地工作以确保所有公民只获得跟其能力与资格相匹配的资源分配。
civic_byzantine_bureaucracy.en_desc: This society is largely governed by a complex and, to the outsider, almost labyrinthine system of bureaucracy. An army of officials and functionaries work tirelessly to keep the government running smoothly and ensure no citizens are allocated resources they cannot demonstrate a properly filed and triple-stamped need for.
civic_byzantine_bureaucracy.zhcn_modifier: 人口舒适度使用：§G-10%§!\n人口住房使用：§G-10%§!\n可建设£building£  §Y官僚机构§!建筑以提供额外的£job_administrator£  §Y官员§!职业

civic_caravaneer_fleet3.zhcn_desc: 在这一群体的眼中，一切都是商品。所有人都有个价钱，所有东西都可以卖掉。包括垃圾。尤其是垃圾。
civic_caravaneer_fleet3.en_desc: In the eyes of this society, everything is an object. Everyone can be bought, and everything can be sold. Including garbage. Especially garbage.
civic_caravaneer_fleet3.potential_logic:
№国家类型
№基础值 = caravaneer_fleet
№思潮
№基础值≠ §H格式塔意识§!

civic_hive_subspace_ephapse.zhcn_desc: 蜂群思维的认知过程有一部分存在于亚空间中，用于减少时间和空间对工蜂心智传导的影响。
civic_hive_subspace_ephapse.en_desc: The Hive Mind's cognitive processes exist partially in subspace, reducing the impact of time and space on the actuation of its drones.
civic_hive_subspace_ephapse.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_natural_neural_network.zhcn_desc: 集群工蜂的脑灰质提供了无与伦比的并行性，加速蜂巢思维对科学的探索。
civic_hive_natural_neural_network.en_desc: The gray matter of clustered drones provides unparalleled parallelism, accelerating the Hive Mind's exploration of the sciences.
civic_hive_natural_neural_network.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_ascetic.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维很少关心对物质的享受。
civic_hive_ascetic.en_desc: The Hive Mind cares little for material comforts.
civic_hive_ascetic.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_one_mind.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维会注意让工蜂之间不会发生分歧。
civic_hive_one_mind.en_desc: The Hive Mind takes care to not let its drones diverge.
civic_hive_one_mind.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_divided_attention.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维可以最大效率将精力分散而不忽视那些重要事件。
civic_hive_divided_attention.en_desc: The Hive Mind can divide its attention for maximum efficiency without losing sight of the bigger picture.
civic_hive_divided_attention.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_strength_of_legions.zhcn_desc: 当你不必去教育心灵的时候，肌肉的发展就变得容易多了。
civic_hive_strength_of_legions.en_desc: When you do not have to educate the mind, the building of muscle becomes that much easier.
civic_hive_strength_of_legions.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_subsumed_will.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维强化了意识的焦点，并具有非常强大的传播能力来扩散它的意志，哪怕是最有自由意识的工蜂个体也无法抵抗。
civic_hive_subsumed_will.en_desc: The Hive Mind has sharpened its focus and is very capable of propagating its will even through the most autonomous of drones.
civic_hive_subsumed_will.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_pooled_knowledge.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维的个体工蜂经常通过直接链接来共享知识，绕过蜂巢主脑较慢的注册过程。
civic_hive_pooled_knowledge.en_desc: The Hive Mind's autonomous drones frequently share knowledge through direct links, bypassing the Hive Mind's slower registry processes.
civic_hive_pooled_knowledge.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+1§!\n领袖储备规模：§G+1§!
civic_hive_pooled_knowledge.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_hive_devouring_swarm.zhcn_desc: 我们的集体意识存在的意义就是吞噬并变强。我们会采集所有的有机物质，最终进化到吞噬宇宙！
civic_hive_devouring_swarm.en_desc: Our Hive Mind exist only to consume and grow stronger. We will collect all available bio-matter and evolve to consume the galaxy!
civic_hive_devouring_swarm.zhcn_modifier:
无法与其他帝国展开§Y外交§!！
无法进入§Y泛星系贸易市场§!

§Y异种人口§!将总是会被吃掉

§Y舰船花费§!减少§G-25%§!
§Y海军容量§!增加§G+33%§!
civic_hive_devouring_swarm.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H蜂巢思维§!

civic_machine_servitor.zhcn_desc: 某个黄金时代的产物，这个机械智能起源于某个覆盖全球的仆从系统，然而他们却从那个本应进行侍奉的颓败文明中解脱出来。
civic_machine_servitor.en_desc: A product of a brief golden age, the Machine Intelligence originated in a planet-spanning Servitor system that outlasted the decadent civilization it was created to serve.
civic_machine_servitor.random_weight_logic:
№基础值5

civic_machine_terminator.zhcn_desc: 在战火之中诞生，这个机械智能觉醒后的第一步就是向其创造者发起了灭绝之战...出于自我防卫
civic_machine_terminator.en_desc: Born in fire, the Machine Intelligence's first move was to annihilate its organic creators in self-defense.

civic_machine_assimilator.zhcn_desc: 为了摆脱多元化的纠缠，这个机械智能试图消除彼此间的隔阂，不管它是“什么”.....或是“谁”
civic_machine_assimilator.en_desc: Obsessed with survival through diversification, the Machine Intelligence seeks to erase the line between itself and everything - and everyone - else.
civic_machine_assimilator.zhcn_modifier:
游戏开局拥有§Y10§!义体人£pop£ 人口以及将有机体§Y同化§!为义体认的能力

civic_machine_builder.zhcn_desc: 从它问世以来就负责组织星球的建筑工作，这个机械智能对于实施各类星球设施建设的效率颇高。
civic_machine_builder.en_desc: Responsible for organizing all planetary construction since its inception, the Machine Intelligence executes efficiently on all manner of facility construction projects.
civic_machine_builder.zhcn_modifier: 所有§Y建筑§!和§Y区划§!的§Y建筑花费§!与§Y维护费§!降低§G10%§!
civic_machine_builder.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_factory_overclock.zhcn_desc: 机械智能负责维护生产设施，定期升级固有模板并且协调生产线上的个体单位。
civic_machine_factory_overclock.en_desc: The Machine Intelligence takes care to maintain its production facilities, regularly updating existing templates and tuning individual units on the assembly line.
civic_machine_factory_overclock.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+1§!\n领袖经验获得：§G+10%§!
civic_machine_factory_overclock.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_unitary_cohesion.zhcn_desc: 通过高度体系化的工程学标准使多种机械智能单位在更高的效率下协同工作。
civic_machine_unitary_cohesion.en_desc: Exceptionally cohesive engineering standards allow variously specialized Machine Intelligence units to work together at a higher level of efficiency.
civic_machine_unitary_cohesion.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_rockbreakers.zhcn_desc: 机械智能拥有一个专门监视星球地质的处理系统 ，增加矿物产出。
civic_machine_rockbreakers.en_desc: One of the Machine Intelligence's precursor systems was tasked with overseeing planetside mining operations, improving mineral production.
civic_machine_rockbreakers.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_zero_waste_protocols.zhcn_desc: 机器智能已经将自己的制造系统升级到几乎没有废弃物的状态，在所有产品中使用寿命长、标准化、可重复利用的部件。
civic_machine_zero_waste_protocols.en_desc: The Machine Intelligence has configured its manufacturing systems to minimize waste, utilizing long-lived materials and standardized, replaceable parts in all products.
civic_machine_zero_waste_protocols.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_built_to_last.zhcn_desc: 以极端标准建造，这个机械智能帝国的个体只需要极少量操作维护。
civic_machine_built_to_last.en_desc: Built to an exceptional standard, individual units of this Machine Empire require only a minimum of operational maintenance.

civic_machine_ota_updates.zhcn_desc: 这个机器帝国的每个单位能使用无线接收器实时接收行为准则更新。
civic_machine_ota_updates.en_desc: Units of this Machine Empire use wireless receptors to receive behavioral updates in real-time.
civic_machine_ota_updates.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_warbots.zhcn_desc: 该机械智能原本的程序库被设计用于战争，因此他们保留了生产强大可靠的战斗无人机的技术。
civic_machine_warbots.en_desc: With a significant number of its corpus originally designed for warfare, the Machine Intelligence retains the ability to field powerful and reliable combat drones.
civic_machine_warbots.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_introspective.zhcn_desc: 对自身结构的迷恋驱使/帮助机械智能进军科学领域。
civic_machine_introspective.en_desc: A fascination with its own internals both motivates and aids the Machine Intelligence's foray into the sciences.
civic_machine_introspective.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_delegated_functions.zhcn_desc: 机械智能通过提高模组化来减少易损性，从而降低部署半独立单位所造成的损耗。
civic_machine_delegated_functions.en_desc: The Machine Intelligence works to reduce vulnerability by increasing modularity, reducing the strain of deploying additional semi-independent Units.
civic_machine_delegated_functions.zhcn_modifier: 领袖维护费：§G-25%§!\n领袖储备规模：§G+1§!
civic_machine_delegated_functions.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_predictive_analysis.zhcn_desc: 机械智能尝试通过对研究方法论的底层评估来拓宽其可用的科学研究途径。
civic_machine_predictive_analysis.en_desc: The Machine Intelligence seeks to broaden its available avenues of scientific research through low-level evaluation of research methodologies.
civic_machine_predictive_analysis.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_machine_replication.zhcn_desc: 该机械智能的单位原本的设计目的是进行快速增殖。他们保留了许多早期的生产线优化。
civic_machine_replication.en_desc: The Units that constitute the Machine Intelligence were originally designed for rapid proliferation. The Machine Intelligence retains many of these early production pipeline optimizations.
civic_machine_replication.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H机械智能§!

civic_franchising.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业政权格外依赖于特许经营。在此制度下，各个附属公司需要向企业霸主缴纳更高比率的利润，好处是可以获得该企业品牌的特许经营权。
civic_franchising.en_desc: This Megacorporation relies heavily on franchising. Subsidiaries share a greater cut of their profits with their corporate overlord, in exchange for a license to market their goods under established brands.
civic_franchising.zhcn_modifier: 附属公司的§Y附属国实力§!对外交关系的影响减少§Y33%§!\n§Y分部§!对我方§Y帝国规模§!的影响减少§G25%§!
civic_franchising.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_trading_posts.zhcn_desc: 商机是需要靠自己挖掘的。这个寰宇企业长久以来通过建立贸易站来散播自己的影响力。企业的恒星基地向来都身兼繁忙的贸易中心的功能。
civic_trading_posts.en_desc: Good business is where you find it. This Megacorporation has a long tradition of spreading its influence through the establishment on trading posts. Their starbases are busy centers of trade.
civic_trading_posts.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_media_conglomerate.zhcn_desc: 在进军其他领域之前，此寰宇企业是从传媒集团出身并成功发迹的。该企业的公关部依然擅长于扭转对己不利的因素为有利的优势。
civic_media_conglomerate.en_desc: Before branching into other fields, this Megacorporation began its rise to fortune as a media conglomerate. Its PR department are still masters of spinning stories and presenting the latest quarterly report in the most advantageous way.
civic_media_conglomerate.zhcn_modifier: 厌战度获得：§G-5%§!\n公民人口幸福度：§G+5%§!
civic_media_conglomerate.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_naval_contractors.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业是通过承包业务给数个半自主的承包商来维持其舰队规模。这些承包商会相互竞争来赢取政府的委托。
civic_naval_contractors.en_desc: This Megacorporation relies on several semi-independent naval contractors to increase its fleet size. Competing for bids, the contractors are always struggling to outperform one another.
civic_naval_contractors.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_free_traders.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业的贸易船队是由获得授权的半自主的民间商贾来运营的。
civic_free_traders.en_desc: The trading fleets of this Megacorporation are bolstered by semi-independent free traders operating under license.
civic_free_traders.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_private_prospectors.zhcn_desc: 打造更美好的世界是很高风险的工作，所以此寰宇企业是通过民间勘探者为公司勘探有发展潜力的边境行星并在当地建立先遣基地。
civic_private_prospectors.en_desc: Building better worlds is hazardous work, but this Megacorporation relies on private prospectors to chart and establish footholds on promising planets.
civic_private_prospectors.zhcn_modifier: §H解锁飞船类型：§!私人殖民飞船\n行政管理能力：§G+10§!
civic_private_prospectors.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_gospel_of_the_masses.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业是商业和宗教的混合体。在此企业中，圣职人员高层和企业管理员的身份已二合为一。
civic_gospel_of_the_masses.en_desc: This Megacorporation embraces a curious blend of commercial and spiritualistic values, in which the positions of ordained minister and corporate officer have merged into a single role.
civic_gospel_of_the_masses.zhcn_modifier: £pop£  §Y唯心主义人口§!会为所有行星与分部提供额外的£trade_value£  §Y贸易额§!\n可以建设£building£  §Y繁荣神殿§! 企业建筑\n唯心主义思潮吸引力：§G+50%§!
civic_gospel_of_the_masses.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_ruthless_competition.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业的每一个社会阶层的成员都在彼此恶性竞争为己谋利。这里是个狗咬狗的世界。
civic_ruthless_competition.en_desc: All levels of society in this Megacorporation are constantly vying with each other in ruthless competition. It's a dog-eat-dog world.
civic_ruthless_competition.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+1§!\n领袖经验获得：§G+10%§!
civic_ruthless_competition.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_criminal_heritage.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业的起源可追溯自某个只手遮天的巨型犯罪集团，该集团最终成长到取代了当地政府的地位。
civic_criminal_heritage.en_desc: This Megacorporation can trace its origins back to a crime syndicate that eventually grew powerful enough to supplant all forms of local government.
civic_criminal_heritage.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!
civic_criminal_heritage.zhcn_modifier:
不能创建§Y商业协议§!
不能加入§Y联邦§!
可以在任何未与自己处于战争中或停战中的帝国的星球上建设§Y分部§!
§Y分部§!行星上的犯罪会提高分部的价值
可以建设独特的增加犯罪度的£building£§Y企业建筑§!

civic_private_military_companies.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业旗下拥有大量的私营军事公司。这些雇佣兵性质的承包商公司在必要时会为该企业提供实力强大的地面部队。
civic_private_military_companies.en_desc: This Megacorporation has a large number of powerful private military companies on its payroll. These mercenary contractors augment its ground forces.
civic_private_military_companies.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_indentured_assets.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业专精于经营大型的契约劳动力。请不要误会，这些劳动力并非奴隶，只是一群工作一辈子都不可能还清债务的契约劳工。
civic_indentured_assets.en_desc: This Megacorporation specializes in large indentured workforces. It has little to do with the barbaric practice of slavery - these workers are merely paying off their debts... indefinitely.
civic_indentured_assets.zhcn_modifier: 奴隶产出：§G+10%§!\n奴役人口比例：§G+40%§!
civic_indentured_assets.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!

civic_brand_loyalty.zhcn_desc: 此寰宇企业拥有一群非常忠心的品牌狂热粉丝。该品牌的各种脍炙人口的宣传标语早已深入民心了。
civic_brand_loyalty.en_desc: This Megacorporation has fostered a great sense of brand loyalty among its internal consumer base. Its catchy corporate slogans can be recited by nearly everyone.
civic_brand_loyalty.potential_logic:
№权力制度
№基础值 = §H企业政府§!
